question: What is the income support given per acre to rice and maize farmers under the Rajiv Gandhi Kisan Nyaya Yojana by Chattisgarh government?
explanation: Rajiv Gandhi Kisan Nyaya Yojana is a new income support programme under which Farmers in Chhattisgarh would get up to ₹13,000 an acre a year. Rice and maize farmers would get ₹10,000 an acre while sugarcane farmers would get ₹13,000.
